text: Niizu, màliɠii, soma é woilo gòoi ma, nɛ̀i gè ga ná-botiɠɛ nui: Ni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é è laaʋilisu mà, naazu é soma é yeezei vebɛani ɠila bu, naa ziilɛi, kɛlɛ ni nuiti ka ti è laaʋilisu mà, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ma nuiti foovo, mazɔlɔɔ ta kpɛ̀ɛzu ga ti kùla zooi ʋa za, nii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI feai ná-nuɓusɛiti zea ga tɔnɔ, kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ ta ɠɛ ɠɛɛzu mà: ‹Li, è gala kiligiti dɛbi.›
